p.k: Lucas Debargue at La Grange de Meslay: Scarlatti, Mozart, Ravel, Liszt. Réalisateurs: François-René Martin (2016).
p.d:
Lucas Debargue (piano)
Domenico Scarlatti Sonata in A major K.208 Sonate in A major K.24 Sonate in C major K.132 Sonate in D minor K.141
Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart Piano Sonata in A minor K.310
Maurice Ravel Gaspard de la Nuit
Franz Liszt Mephisto Waltz no. 1
Erik Satie Gnossienne no. 1
Frédéric Chopin Grande valse brillante en mi bémol majeur opus 18
Recorded on 26 June 2016 at the Grange de Meslay Directed by François-René Martin
